title: Tender Offer Threatens Squeeze on Topix 500’s Most-Shorted Stock
description: Tsuruha Holdings Inc. has become one of the most heavily shorted stocks in Japan as investors position for its tender-offer-driven rally to fade. But analysts warn that this strategy may end in a short squeeze if the drug store operator’s earnings beat expectations.
